question: Who has been appointed as the Chairman of Asian Boxing Confederation's (ASBC) competitions commission?
explanation: Kishen Narsi from India has been appointed as the Chairman of Asian Boxing Confederation\'s (ASBC) competitions commission. Narsi is  a former All-India University champion boxer. He was an international referee and vice-chairman of the executive committee of the International Boxing Association (AIBA). He has officiated in three Olympics. He was also the founding interim president of the Boxing Federation of India (BFI).
